txt.en:
'Hail, [placeholder], I hear that Céola has recruited you for service. I think one of your talents is just what we need.

'Céola, he does not believe that we should engage these Khundolar dogs directly -- at least, not until we deal with the other threats in these lands -- but I say that we should take action against them now, lest their numbers grow stronger.

'To prove my point to Céola, would you go out and defeat a few of these Easterlings? They have a large war-camp to the south, but their scouts range the Brown Lands openly.'
'Good on you, [placeholder]! Surely now, Céola will see reason.'
A Black Wind from the East
Dagbert wants to deal directly with the Khundolar and drive them forth from the Brown Lands.
Defeated Khundolar in the Brown Lands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Khundolar in the Brown Lands ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

Khundolar Easterlings can be found throughout the Brown Lands, but especially at their encampment, Lashkarg, to the south of Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nDagbert has asked you to defeat a few Khundolar Easterlings to prove to Céola that they can and must be dealt with immediately.
Talk to Dagbert at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Dagbert is at Etheburg in the Brown Lands, north of Lashkarg.\n\nYou should return to Dagbert with news of your success.
